title: Build IT Technology featured on The OCMX Marketplace
text:
TORONTO – October 1, 2015 – The OCMX ™ is pleased to announce the listing of Build IT Technology on its Institutional Marketplace. The OCMX™ will offer accredited investors the ability to participate in the equity raise through its Crowdfunding Portal.
The OCMX™ spent the past months completing its due diligence process on Build IT Technology and concluded that the company represents significant opportunity for accredited investors.
They note that Build IT Technology offers a ‘one stop’ service providing inventive eco-friendly products and services in a high demand and growing industry. Franchise retail sites, sports and recreational centres, and car dealerships are a few businesses that can benefit from the services offered by Build IT Technology. For more information on Build IT Technology, visit their market listing page .
The Opportunity
Build IT Technology Inc. (BIT) provides a suite of unique products and innovative service programs that are cost effective, healthier and Eco- Friendly to Builders, Architects, Property Owners and Renovators. BIT is offering lower prices, higher quality and a wider range of services. All of their products are environmentally sensitive, cost effective and are said to reduce fossil fuel dependence.
The OCMX
The OCMX™ is changing Corporate Finance as we know it through its Online Institutional Marketplace. Their marketplace serves as a highly structured online portal for both private and public entities which need additional growth capital by way of connecting the relevant advisors, companies, and investors in one online transparent marketplace.
The OCMX™ specializes in advising and raising capital for leading growth enterprises. They provide advisors, companies, and investors with instant access to their Online Institutional Marketplace so that they can actively source and screen their next investment opportunity or financing partner.
The OCMX™ specializes in Early Stage Financing, Equity Markets, Project Financing, Business Finance, Corporate Finance, and helping companies with Going Public. Learn more about The OCMX™ by visiting their marketplace .
